comments:
I get the following error when I opened a pareticular Java file. Others seem to
open OK. Here are the steps to get the file in question:

1) Load org.eclipse.team.ui from the tag I20041214
2) In the packages explorer, drill down to the package org.eclipse.team.internal.ui
3) Open the file DefaultUIFileModificationValidator

The following error appears in the editor

I just tried this with I20050509-2010 but could open the file (rev. 1.2) without
problems.

Which build did you use?
What are your folding settings (I tried several combinations)?
What's your encoding (I tried cp1252 and utf-8)?
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 55814 ***
